en.name: Adjutant
en.text: Greetings commander. You have been awakened from stasis. The current date is September 21st, 2687.

en.name: Commander
en.text: What? I thought we were only going to be under for a few months. This wasn’t supposed to happen at all.

en.name: Commander
en.text: What happened? Why have I been in stasis for over a hundred years?

en.name: Adjutant
en.text: Security protocol dictates that persons in stasis should be kept in stasis until either the destination has been reached, or the ship reaches problematic thresholds.

en.name: Adjutant
en.text: Currently the food replimat is out of ice cream, putting the ship above protocol threshold seven. There are 1523 prior protocol issues of which 1512 have been corrected.

en.name: Commander
en.text: Adjutant, why aren’t we at our destination?

en.name: Commander
en.text: How many jumps away is earth?
